summary: Provides a runnable example that trains a self‑supervised graph neural network using the Bootstrap Graph Representation Learning (BGRL) approach and evaluates the learned embeddings on downstream tasks such as node classification and link prediction.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to apply BGRL for representation learning on graph data, showcasing model setup, training with data augmentations, and downstream evaluation to guide developers in building similar self‑supervised GNN pipelines.
